title.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, June 12, 1931. Graduation Exercises to Be Held at St. Cyril and Methodius Parish

div.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, June 12, 1931. GRADUATION EXERCISES TO BE HELD AT ST. CYRIL AND METHODIUS PARISH

body.p: Graduating exercises at St. Cyril and Methodius school, where Rev. John Fedor is parish pastor, will be held this evening June 12.

Included in this program will be a musical comedy, "Greenhorn," in which only school children will participate. There will be other interesting features. The program will begin at 7:30 P. M. The venerable nuns, as well as the school children, are inviting parents and friends to spend an enjoyable evening.
